unnormalised: Yaar, solar rooftop subsidies are a great idea! My cousin, Priya in Bangalore, got hers sorted last Diwali. Reduced her electricity bill by like, Rs. 2000 a month! Heard the MNRE is doing a good job pushing these. Hoping more folks in Chennai try it. Maybe I'll have it installed before Onam so I can power my biryani cooking sessions guilt-free! It's truly the future, especially with all the power cuts these days!
normalised: Dude, solar rooftop subsidies are a great idea! My cousin, Priya in Bangalore, got hers sorted last Diwali. Reduced her electricity bill by like, rupee two thousand a month! Heard the M N R E is doing a good job pushing these. Hoping more folks in Chennai try it. Maybe I'll have it installed before Onam so I can power my biryani cooking sessions guilt-free! It's truly the future, especially with all the power cuts these days!
